There are actually three APIs, each used for different purposes:

1. [**api**](https://api.marinesensitivities.org)\
  _custom API: using R [plumber](https://www.rplumber.io/)_\
  source: [MarineSensitivities/api]( https://github.com/MarineSensitivities/api/blob/main/plumber.R)\
  <img width="300" alt="Screenshot 2023-10-26 at 1 02 05 PM" src="https://github.com/MarineSensitivities/server/assets/2837257/3ff49d8c-8569-4111-9e63-2998960ea192">\
  
1. [**swagger**](https://swagger.marinesensitivities.org)\
  _generic database API: using [PostGREST](https://postgrest.org/en/stable/)_\
  source: Postgres database, non-spatial\
  <img width="300" alt="Screenshot 2023-10-26 at 1 02 05 PM" src="https://github.com/MarineSensitivities/server/assets/2837257/787cc7b6-b1cd-4c1a-b896-4f17777b1d7d">\

1. [**tile**](https://tile.marinesensitivities.org)\
  _spatial database API: using [pg_tileserv](https://postgrest.org/en/stable/) for serving vector tiles_\
  source: Postgres database, spatial\
  <img width="300" alt="Screenshot 2023-10-26 at 1 46 00 PM" src="https://github.com/MarineSensitivities/server/assets/2837257/73398fe2-4b09-4ec9-8b14-2ef25165ecf4">\
